content: p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 14 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 15 - rs slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 yo k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 yo k1 p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 16 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 17 - rs slip 1 s k2 slip m *k2 yo k3 k3tog k3 yo k2 p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 18 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 19 - rs slip 1 s k2 slip m *k3 yo k3 ssk k5 p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 20 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 21 - rs slip 1 s k2 slip m *k4 yo k3 ssk k4 p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 22 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 23 - rs slip 1 s k2 slip m *k5 yo k3 ssk k3 p1 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 row 24 - ws slip 1 s k2 slip m *k1 p13 slip m* repeat *-* 5 times k3 repeat row 1 - 24 until your shawl is the desired length knit 5 row cast off loosely wrong side facing you finishing weave in ends soak and block following instructions on your chosen yarn wear and feel fabulous 3 chart ← this is where you start 4 chart symbols abbreviations m - marker s - stitch k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit 2 stitches together k3tog - knit 3 stitches together ssk - slip two stitches and knit them together through the back loop rs - right side ws - wrong side 5
